parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Animations

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> When used on a person, a smooth transition to the given action will be initiated.
<br>
For Arma 3 actions see: [[playAction/actions]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> soldier '''playAction''' action

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> soldier: [[Object]] -

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> action: [[String]] -

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> Nothing

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>soldierOne [[playAction]] "SitDown"</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[playActionNow]], [[switchAction]], [[playMove]], [[playMoveNow]], [[switchMove]]
</value></part></template>
